data.message: well here we go again.....v hard to connect and interact with people when we have no ticker...!!!!!!!    no more report a problem links , they do not work..!!!!..3 weeks reporting the issue and hundreds of people like myself have been reporting also......GET IT FIXED !!!!!!!!!  PLEASE.

replies.message: They won't. Facebook just don't care. This site is a mess. I'm in the dark too with NO TICKER. And after several request on the issue with NO response I just can't deal with them anymore. Social site minus the interaction. So tired of it.
